title.en: Isami Ishii Masterpiece Collection 3: Detective Chief Koga

altTitles.ja: 石井いさみ傑作集3 甲賀探偵長

description.en:
3rd volume of Ishii's works
Three stories full of joy, anger, sadness, and happiness brought to you by the author of the youth epic ``750 Rider''!
Introducing the third installment of Ishii's works collection, which brings together the author's best detective action, war stories, and hard-boiled works!!

Commentary
~Isami Ishii Anthology Part 3~

Detective action against a mysterious organization!
A war drama that throws itself into a harsh battlefield!
A hard-boiled character who is surprised by his connection with a killer. Works!

We bring you a drama filled with courage and sadness created by Isami Ishii!

<Koga Detective Chief>
1961 work
Goro Koga, a descendant of the Koga ninja living in modern times -- call him Koga Detective Chief !!
Detective Chief Koga stands up against the international smuggling group 77 (Seven Seven), which plans to use the latest robots for evil purposes! Detective action begins!!

<Shonen Zero Sentai>
1962 work Formed to stop the hydrogen bomb being dropped on Tokyo
Shonen Zero Sentai. I will burn up my young life to protect my homeland, Japan!

<Red Colt>
1963 work
Kenji, a young man, confronts a killer known as Ken the Colt.
What is the secret between the two...!?
